channel.title: How you declare a variable :(
channel.description:
please help me out.. im really stuck
[code]client.java:5922: cannot find symbol symbol : variable DCdown location: class client DCdown = 4; ^ client.java:5923: cannot find symbol symbol : variable DCDamg location: class client DCDamg = true; ^ client.java:16520: cannot find symbol symbol : variable DCDamg location: class client if ((IsAttackingNPC) && DCDamg == true ) { ^ client.java:16521: cannot find symbol symbol : variable DCdown location: class client if (DCdown == 2 ) { ^ client.java:16525: cannot find symbol symbol : variable DCdown location: class client DCdown -= 1; ^ client.java:16526: cannot find symbol symbol : variable DCdown location: class client if (DCdown == 0 ) { ^ client.java:16527: cannot find symbol symbol : variable DCDamg location: class client DCDamg = false; ^ client.java:16530: cannot find symbol symbol : variable DCDamg location: class client if (IsAttacking == true && DCDamg == true ) { ^ client.java:16531: cannot find symbol symbol : variable DCdown location: class client if (DCdown == 2 ) { ^ client.java:16535: cannot find symbol symbol : variable DCdown location: class client DCdown -= 1; ^ client.java:16536: cannot find symbol symbol : variable DCdown location: class client if (DCdown == 0 ) { ^ client.java:16537: cannot find symbol symbol : variable DCDamg location: class client DCDamg = false; ^ 12 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
i keep getting this problem and i have no idea where to start or anything

item.title: How you declare a variable :(
item.dc:creator: @idunno54 idunno54
item.description:
@idunno54 wrote:

go buy or pirate C++ for dummies.

Read full topic

item.title: How you declare a variable :(
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

You have to declare it with a primitive data type i.e; int, double, boolean, float, byte, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: How you declare a variable :(
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

FitzyBoy:

what you want me to do with that?

OMFG…

Thats what will remove your errors. you never declared the specials correctly, you never declared weather the hit variables and timers were a boolean or a an INT. Please read the tutorial section on the biggest tutorial in moparscape.

Read full topic
